chapter.text: You keep running down the hall. ^1500You nearly slip on something as you sprint. ^1500You look back and see small puddles of blood on the floor through the hall. ^1500You turn back around to look forward and almost run into a wall. ^1500You reach a dead end. ^1500You look around for another way to go, but all you see is lockers. ^1500The footsteps behind you grow louder.
